ssot__SalesOrder__dlm.name: Sales Order
ssot__SalesOrder__dlm.description: The Sales Order DMO represents current and pending sales orders.

ssot__ActivatedByUserId__c.description: A reference ID to user who activated order.

ssot__AdjustedProductTaxAmount__c.description: The total product tax plus the total adjustment tax amount.

ssot__AdjustedTotalProductAmount__c.description: The total product amount plus the total adjustment amount.

ssot__BillToAccountId__c.description: A reference ID to account billed for order. Can only be updated when order's StatusCode value is Draft.

ssot__BillToAddressId__c.description: A reference ID to billing address.

ssot__BillToContactId__c.description: A reference ID to customer billed for order.

ssot__BilltoEmailId__c.description: A reference ID to email address of customer billed for order.

ssot__BilltoPhoneNumberId__c.description: A reference ID to phone number of customer billed for order.

ssot__BillingDayOfTheMonth__c.description: The day of the month that customer is invoiced.

ssot__CanBillNow__c.description: An indicator if a customer is eligible to bill.

ssot__CompanyAuthorizedById__c.description: A reference ID to user who authorized the account associated with order.

ssot__ConfirmationRecipientEmailtext__c.description: A list of email addresses to send messages for order confirmation. Not for large volume implementations

ssot__ContractId__c.description: A reference ID to contract associated with order. Can only be updated when the order's Status Code value is Draft.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CurrencyCode__c.description: A reference ID to currency code for order. Currency code is used for all child objects, such as sales order product and sales order price adjustments.

ssot__CustomerAuthorizedById__c.description: A reference ID to contact who authorized order.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name for system that is source of records identified by External Record Id.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceId__c.description: A reference ID to electronic unit where signals are tracked, for example fridge, watch or car.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for external data source record.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FiledDate__c.description: The date the order was filed.

ssot__GrandTotalAmount__c.description: The total amount of the order.

ssot__InternalBusinessUnitId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit within seller organization responsible for order.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns business account.

ssot__IsAlerted__c.description: An indicator if a user is notified when something went wrong during order workflow.

ssot__IsAnonymous__c.description: An indicator if the order was placed by unregistered guest user.

ssot__IsClosed__c.description: An indicator if the order is closed. Used to drive and halt workflows.

ssot__IsContracted__c.description: An indicator if the order placed is under the terms of a contract.

ssot__IsHistoricalOnly__c.description: An indicator for when an order is historical and can’t be changed.

ssot__IsSuspended__c.description: An indicator for when an order is suspended.

ssot__IsTaxExempt__c.description: An indicator for whether taxes apply to order.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__OpportunityId__c.description: A reference ID to the opportunity associated with order.

ssot__OrderEndDate__c.description: The date when the order ends, such as for a subscription.

ssot__OrderinsuranceAmountCurrency__c.description: A reference ID to the currency of the order insurance amount.

ssot__OrderNumber__c.description: A unique number assigned to order and displayed to end users.

ssot__OrderStartDate__c.description: The date when order becomes effective, such as when a subscription begins.

ssot__OriginalOrderId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent order.

ssot__OwnerUserId__c.description: A reference ID to the user or entity who owns this order.

ssot__PriceCalculationStatusMessagetext_.description: The status message describing the state of the order’s price calculation.

ssot__PromiseDate__c.description: The date the order was promised.

ssot__PurchaseOrderNumber__c.description: The number identifying a purchase order.

ssot__QuoteId__c.description: A reference ID to quote associated with order.

ssot__RenewalTermId__c.description: A reference ID to length of renewal term for renewal orders.

ssot__RenewalUpliftRate__c.description: For renewal orders, percentage of increase or decrease in order quantity.

ssot__RequestedStartDate__c.description: The customer's preferred date for order fulfillment.

ssot__SalesChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to the sales channel used to place order.

ssot__SalesOrderConfirmationStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to what stage of customer approval and finalization has been achieved.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for Sales Order DMO.

ssot__SalesOrderStatusId__c.description: Current order status, for example, draft, ready for review, or placed.

ssot__SalesOrderSystemStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to order status with fixed values such as draft or activated.

ssot__SalesOrderTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of order, for example, change, renewal, or amendment.

ssot__SalesStoreId__c.description: A reference ID to the store used to place order.

ssot__SellerId__c.description: A reference ID to order seller.

ssot__ShipToAddressId__c.description: A reference ID to location where order is shipped.

ssot__ShipToContactId__c.description: A reference ID to contact entity to whom order is shipped.

ssot__ShipToEmailId__c.description: A reference ID to email of contact entity to whom order is shipped.

ssot__ShoppingCartId__c.description: A reference ID to shopping cart that customer used to select products in order, before placing order.

ssot__SoldToCustomerId__c.description: A reference ID to the customer.

ssot__TotalAdjustedDeliveryTaxAmount__c.description: The total delivery tax amount, if adjusted.

ssot__TotalAdjustmentAmount__c.description: The sum of all order price adjustments, excluding taxes on any adjustments.

ssot__TotalAdjustmentTaxAmount__c.description: The total tax amount, if adjusted.

ssot__TotalAmountCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency of the total amount.

ssot__TotalBookingAmount__c.description: The total amount of a sales order product booking.

ssot__TotalCancelledBillingAmount__c.description: The total of all canceled orders.

ssot__TotalDeliveryAmount__c.description: A total of product, adjustment, and delivery fee amounts, but excluding taxes.

ssot__TotalDeliverytAmountCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency of the total delivery amount.

ssot__TotalDeliveryFeeCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to currency of the total delivery amount.

ssot__TotalDeliveryTaxAmount__c.description: The total amount of delivery tax.

ssot__TotalPendingBillingAmount__c.description: The total pending for all orders.

ssot__TotalProductAmount__c.description: The total cost of the product.

ssot__TotalProductAmountCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to currency of the total product amount.

ssot__TotalProductTaxAmount__c.description: The total amount of taxes for all product.

ssot__TotalProductTaxAmountCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to currency of the total product tax amount.
